SageTVPlugin.Name: Change Channel to Record
SageTVPlugin.Description: SageTV asks the user if the channel should be changed when a upcoming recording on a different channel conflicts with live TV on the current channel. This plugin allows a user to set a default action.
SageTVPlugin.Author: 49studebaker
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
*Version 1.1.2 - Added options: "Ask, but change the channel if no response" and "Ask, but don't change the channel if no response".
*Version 1.1.0 - Added configuration options: Main Menu...Setup...Detailed Setup...Customize..."Change Channel to Record"
*Version 1.0.1 - Initial release.
